alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Taylor; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A gusty outflow boundary will impact portions of Taylor, east central Gilmer, Lewis, northwestern Upshur, northwestern Barbour and Harrison Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty outflow boundary from Camden northeast to Lumberport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksburg, Buckhannon, Grafton, Weston, Philippi, Bridgeport, Shinnston, Stonewood, Nutter Fort, Lumberport, Anmoore, Jackson Mill, Stonewall Jackson, Rock Cave, Enterprise, West Milford, Lost Creek, Jane Lew, Flemington and Valley Falls. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 83 and 128. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 71 and 82. Route 33 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Taylor; Upshur
